column1: Kata Robata////This place used to be Hue
column2: but added a grill and just reopened yesterday.  The interior decoration is mostly the same.  The menu has changed
column3: as the vermicelli dishes are now gone.  I got the caterpillar rolls and crunchy eel rolls
column4: which were ok but not the best.  My co-worker got a bento box with beef
column6: and pork and was very happy with his food.  I would probably come back
column7: just to try something other than the sushi.
